name.min: Name must be at least 3 characters
name.firstLetterUppercaseOrNoSpaces: Please avoid spaces, hyphens and be sure to capitalize the first letter of each word.

identifier.min: identifier must be at least 6 characters
identifier.max: identifier must be at most 20 characters long
identifier.invalidFormat: include letters (upper and lower case), numbers, hyphens (-) and underscores (_).

firstName.min: First Name must be at least 3 characters

lastName.min: Last Name must be at least 3 characters

username.min: User Name must be at least 3 characters

userController.min: User controller must be at least 3 characters long
userController.max: User controller must be at most 10 characters long
userController.matches: Contains only alphabetic, numeric and underscore characters _ .

login.min: Login must be at least 3 characters

password.min: Password must be at least 6 characters
password.miin: Password must be at least 4 characters
password.matches: Password must contain at least one special character
password.max: Password must contain at most one special character
password.matche: Contains only alphabetic, numeric and underscore characters _ .

phone.min: Phone must be at least 8 digits

address.min: Address must be at least 4 characters

ptsId.min: ptsId must be at least 24 characters

controllerPtsId.matches: Controller ID must contain exactly 24 numbers
controllerPtsId.min: ptsId must be at least 24 characters

city.min: City must be at least 3 characters

plannedExportDate.greaterThan: Activation date must be greater than or equal to the current date and time.
